definitions.definition: A heavier four - wheeled (normally horse-drawn) vehicle designed to carry goods (or sometimes people).
Abbreviation of toy wagon ; A child 's riding toy , with the same structure as a wagon (sense 1) , pulled or steered by a long handle attached to the front .
A vehicle (wagon) designed to transport goods or people on railway .
Ellipsis of dinner wagon ( “ set of light shelves mounted on castors so that it can be pushed around a dining room and used for serving ” ) .
Ellipsis of paddy wagon ( “ police van for transporting prisoners ” ) .

Ellipsis of station wagon ( “ type of car in which the roof extends rearward to produce an enclosed area in the position of and serving the function of the boot ( trunk ) ” ) ; ( by extension ) a sport utility vehicle ( SUV ); any car .

subdefinitions.definition: A woman of loose morals , a promiscuous woman, a slapper .
An obnoxious woman ; a bitch ; a cow .

definitions.definition: A kind of prefix used in de Bruijn notation .

main_definition: A heavier four - wheeled (normally horse-drawn) vehicle designed to carry goods (or sometimes people). [from late 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: Abbreviation of toy wagon ; A child 's riding toy , with the same structure as a wagon (sense 1) , pulled or steered by a long handle attached to the front .
( US , chiefly New England ) A shopping cart .
( rail transport ) A vehicle (wagon) designed to transport goods or people on railway .
Ellipsis of dinner wagon ( “ set of light shelves mounted on castors so that it can be pushed around a dining room and used for serving ” ) .
( slang ) Ellipsis of paddy wagon ( “ police van for transporting prisoners ” ) .

( chiefly Australia , US , slang ) Ellipsis of station wagon ( “ type of car in which the roof extends rearward to produce an enclosed area in the position of and serving the function of the boot ( trunk ) ” ) ; ( by extension ) a sport utility vehicle ( SUV ); any car .
( Ireland , slang , derogatory ) Term of abuse.
( mathematics ) A kind of prefix used in de Bruijn notation .
